original_text: Jesus saw two fishing boats at the edge of the lake. The fishermen had left the boats there and they were now washing their nets.
korean_text: 호숫가에 배 두 척이 있는 것을 보시니 어부들은 배에서 나와서 그물을 씻는지라

sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 두 척의 고기잡이 배를 보셨습니다

sentences.original_text: at the edge of the lake
The fishermen had left the boats there
and they were now washing their nets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 그들은 그물을 씻고 있었습니다
